Summary Note:
Ingrid Ève Guillaume and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Paris. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
Having worked for over 40 years, Ingrid Ève Guillaume brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Ingrid Ève Guillaume is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Ingrid graduated from Lycée Carnot in 1980.
Ingrid finished her studies at EMIC de Lyon in 1985.
Occupation History:
Ingrid Ève Guillaume is a 64 year old and comes from France.
Ingrid Ève Guillaume began her professional journey as a Investment Banker at Société Générale S.A. in 1985, laying the foundation for future success.
Her subsequent role was as a Private Equity Investor at Natixis S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 1987 to 1990.
Her tenure as a Hedge Fund Manager at Crédit Agricole S.A. from 1990 to 1991 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
In 1992, she transitioned to BNP Paribas S.A. to take on the position of Venture Capitalist, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 2030000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
